comment: Show up, sparknotes before class, discuss and pass. He is not a boring teacher and is easy.

Make sure you read or you will float during class discussions and fail quizzes and exams! Easy class if you read and take notes (whatever he writes on the board will be on the exam). Drops 2 lowest quizzes and sometimes curves the test if the class grade is low. Expect to write two essays during the semester.  Awesome professor, would take again.
